title: Uncovering Kaitlyn
description: Eighteen year old Kaitlyn Fox is Britain’s fastest rising artist. Within weeks her single has gone viral and everyone wants to know her, but Kaitlyn is damaged and now she only trusts her best friend Jake. That is, until she meets Hollywood star Jamie Stark.Jamie Stark is a Hollywood heartthrob, but nobody other than his best friend knows the ‘real’ him. Jamie doesn’t date and he doesn’t have any friends other than Ryan, but everything changes when he meets a petrified Kaitlyn Fox on the Howard Collins Show.When Jamie has to teach Kaitlyn to act for an upcoming movie he can’t believe his luck, especially when Kaitlyn wants him to take her out. Kaitlyn gives Jamie one condition: Nobody can find out…This is a Mature young adult novel and contains strong language.
author: Emma  Jane
